data.text: Great location. Walking distance to all the things we wanted to see. Loved the balconies in our unit overlooking La Placa Del Sol. Very friendly and helpful Sonder employees during check-in and check-out. Lots to do in the Gracia neighborhood surrounding hotel.
data.title: Great location and staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our great location and the balconies overlooking La PlaÃ§a Del Sol. It's fantastic to know that you found our city team friendly and helpful during check-in and check-out. We're glad you explored the neighborhood surrounding the hotel. We look forward to hosting you again for another memorable experience.
owner_response.author: Sonder Team

data.text: Lovely hotel - friendly, helpful and welcoming staff, and a very clean and spacious room that was serviced daily.  We had a view over the square which was great - if noisy on a Friday night!  (The hotel provided earplugs.). There's a nice-looking restaurant downstairs, and a very nice roof-top bar.  The location is great - surrounded by interesting shops, bars and restaurants.  We can't wait to go back!
data.title: Planning our next visit already!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience at the hotel! It's wonderful to hear that you found the staff friendly and helpful, and the room clean and spacious. The view over the square sounds like a nice touch, although it comes with the vibrancy of Friday nights! The provision of earplugs shows thoughtfulness on the hotel's part. The surrounding shops, bars, and restaurants, along with the amenities like the restaurant and rooftop bar, seem to have added to your overall enjoyment. We're thrilled to hear you're already planning your next visit, and we look forward to welcoming you back! If you have any specific highlights or suggestions, feel free to share. Safe travels!
owner_response.author: Sonder Team

data.text: My girlfriend booked this as an excursion to Barcelona. Absolutely perfect for a city stay. Minimalist room and decor, but with everything you could need for a room to stay between exploring the city! Great vista of the square and beautiful styling throughout, would stay again and recommend for anyone wanting to stay in Barcelona.
data.title: Perfect minimalist room

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay in Barcelona, and for sharing your positive feedback. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit and found our minimalist room design and decor to your liking. It's great to know that you appreciated the amenities and the beautiful view of the square. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future and thank you for recommending us to others. Safe travels!
owner_response.author: Sonder Team

data.text: Incredibly clean rooms and sheets, the staff were so welcoming and helpful throughout our stay. We especially loved how close it is to local restaurants and appreciated the seamless access we had to the rooftop area. I would definitely visit again. Thanks so much ðŸ˜Š
data.title: Great !

Our team takes pride in providing excellent service and maintaining clean rooms for our guests. We're glad you enjoyed the convenient location, the nearby restaurants, and the rooftop area. Your kind words are truly appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit. Thank you for choosing us! ðŸ˜Š

data.text:
great rooms, right in front of Plaza del Sol.  small great restaurant downstairs.  Nice shower and bathroom area.  Big for European standards. 
Hotel is in Gracia District, many restaurants and cafes everywhere.  Subway 5 mins away. Fantastic location
data.title: Great Gem in Front of Plaza del Sol in Gracia District

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your fantastic review! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. Our location in the Gracia District, right in front of Plaza del Sol, provides easy access to restaurants, cafes, and the subway, making it convenient for our guests to explore the area. We're glad you liked our great rooms, the small restaurant downstairs, and the nice shower and bathroom area. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we appreciate your kind words. We hope to welcome you back for another fantastic stay in the future!
owner_response.author: Sonder Team
